entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Tatamagouche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:20 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with periods of rain after midnight. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming north 20 overnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023
